document_name: Poverty Alleviation and Empowerment of Women Tarayana Foundation  2012.pdf
Poverty Alleviation and Empowerment of Rural Women
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/BTN/00050208/Poverty Alleviation and Empowerment of Women Tarayana Foundation  2012.pdf

outputs.output_descr:
I) Vulnerable communities of the villages of Samthang, Lawa, Lamgang, Thaphu and Metana provided with basic house building skills; support to enable school going children to stay in school; make the community more credit worthy; improve marketing of their artisan craft products and surplus agricultural products; and improve nutrition intake of households.
II) The capacity of local governments to plan, implement and monitor their development plans enhanced.
III) The specific needs of employment and income generating activities of rural women in Samtse and Zhemgang addressed.

donor_name: ARAB GULF PROGRAMME FOR UN DEVELOPMENT &
outputs.output_descr: Poverty Alleviation and Empowerment of Rural Women - The AWP aims to address the specific needs of employment and income generating activities of rural women in Jurmey Geog, Mongar Dzongkhag.

project_descr: Poverty Alleviation and Empowerment of Rural Women
project_title: Poverty Alleviation and Empowerment of  Rural Bhutan
